title: Game with no broadcast in hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the homepage
AND a game with no feeds is in the hero

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is in pregame state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the start time is listed
AND Watch button does NOT display

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is in a live state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN "NO BROADCAST AVAILABLE" is displayed at the bottom of the hero
AND Watch button does NOT display

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is in a final state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN "NO BROADCAST AVAILABLE" is displayed at the bottom of the hero
AND Watch button does NOT display
